mapper.insert: insert into failure_analysis (city_code, subway_car_code, manufacturer_code, production_batch_code, line_code, failure_cause, analysis_result, happening_time, create_user) values (#{cityCode}, #{subwayCarCode}, #{manufacturerCode}, #{productionBatchCode}, #{lineCode}, #{failureCause}, #{analysisResult}, #{happeningTime}, #{createUser})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from failure_analysis fa
AND CONCAT_WS(',' , city_code , subway_car_code , manufacturer_code , production_batch_code , line_code , failure_cause , analysis_result , happening_time ) Like #{advanceColumnLike}
